person.persName: John Buckner Holladay (Nicholas County, Kentucky, sheriff and soldier)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, sheriff and soldier. Nicholas County native. Son of Thomas Holladay. Married to Sarah “Sallie” Morgan Holladay on June 14, 1855. Father of Lulu Holladay, Charlotte Holladay, Lattie Holladay, and Kate Holladay. Landlord in Nicholas County in 1850. Household owned fourteen enslaved persons on Nicholas County in 1850. Sheriff in Nicholas County in 1860. Served in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Rifles Battalion (C.S.A.) as captain and major from October 22, 1861.
